content: this pattern is great for holding your hot bowl of soup or cold bowl of ice cream it can also go in the microwave while re-heating items in your bowl and the corners can be used for carrying ****be careful to not get your hot pad wet before putting it in the microwave this can cause serious burns **** materials size f 3 75 mm crochet hook worsted weight medium 4 cotton yarn 120 yards peaches and cream peace and bright chartreuse used for sample yarn needle size fits a 6 inch bowl base 5 inches measured from increases across finished sides height 3 inches edges 7 inches x 4 sides gauge 4 single_crochet = 1 inch 5 single_crochet row = 1 inch stitches and terms used chain chain single_crochet single_crochet st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch * note this pattern is worked up tightly so that it holds shape around the bowl not all worsted weight cotton s are equal some work up much smaller so be sure to check your gauge to ensure a proper fit
